name: Dream Harvest
description:
Recommend that you play in full-screen mode.

My first game jam entry! Created for Mini Jam #92: Death. Contestants had 72 hours. The theme was 'death' and the limitation was 'your health is your weapon'.

There's bugs, there's no animations, but hey, I did it.

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

WASD

Harvest mode = Q

Gamepad:

Jump = A

Harvest mode = X

Note: Harvest mode allows for double-jump.
